reviews.review_text:
Mama Boho is a colourful little cafe serving healthy and delicious meals. I got the cacao smoothie bowl, the mediterranean bowl and a la coco smoothie. They all hit the spot üëåüèæ

The owner was lovely and chatty and gave me some great recommendations for what to do while in Goa. Would come again üòÑ

A wonderful recommendation for the health and wellness conscious.
I had a fluten free bread toasts , A cacoo acai  smoothie bowl & ther avocado wraps.  which was all made extremely delicious. All there smoothies are organic and sustainably sourced too
A lunch buddy had a balanced bowl which was delicious too The sauces were really good. judging from the crowd present during my visit it looks like venue is particularly popular with radiant yoginis as a post yoga lunch spot

Mama Boho Smoothie Bar & Kitchen is a gem! The smoothie I had was not only delicious but also incredibly healthy with a perfect texture. The atmosphere is cozy, and the staff is friendly and attentive. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a nutritious and satisfying treat!
